product_name: Hi-Tec V-Lite Snowflake Chukka 200 Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Stroll securely down snowy sidewalks and step through big snowbanks in the waterproof, insulated Hi-Tec V-Lite Snowflake Chukka 200 Boots. Waterproof suede leather and textile uppers provide all-day comfort and keep your feet dry when you're tromping through the snow. Faux-fur cuffs and linings provide extra warmth and feel soft against skin. 200g Thinsulate(R) polyester insulation provides exceptional warmth. Invisible exterior protective ion-mask(TM) treatment layer is over 1,000 times smaller than a human hair, yet adds durability without affecting the look or feel. Removable EVA insoles and molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide stability on uneven terrain. Winter-traction, siped rubber outsoles are at home on slippery surfaces. The Hi-Tec V-Lite Snowflake Chukka 200 Boots have convenient pull-on style, with a double-button closure on the side of each boot. Closeout.
short_description: Stroll securely down snowy sidewalks and step through big snowbanks in the waterproof, insulated Hi-Tec V-Lite Snowflake Chukka 200 Boots.
